mapper.insert: Insert into Companies(address_id, contact_id, name, sphere) values (#{addressId}, #{contactId}, #{company.name}, #{company.sphere})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id as company_id, c.name as company_name, c.sphere as company_sphere, a.id as address_id, a.country as company_address, a.city as company_city, a.street as company_street, a.house as company_house, con.id as contact_id, con.phone_number as company_phone_number, con.email as company_email, con.website as company_website FROM Companies c LEFT JOIN Addresses a ON a.id = c.address_id LEFT JOIN Contacts con ON con.id = c.contact_id WHERE c.id = #{id};

SELECT c.id as company_id, a.id as address_id, con.id as contact_id, c.name as company_name, c.sphere as company_sphere FROM Companies c LEFT JOIN Addresses a ON a.id = c.address_id LEFT JOIN Contacts con ON con.id = c.contact_id WHERE c.id = #{id};

SELECT c.id as company_id, c.name as company_name, c.sphere as company_sphere, d.id as department_id, d.name as department_name, e.id as employee_id, e.first_name as employee_first_name, e.last_name as employee_last_name, e.dob as employee_dob, e.year_of_employment as employee_year_of_employment FROM Companies c LEFT JOIN Departments d ON c.id = d.company_id LEFT JOIN Employees e ON d.id = e.department_id;
